constituent: nara, large, St. Bernard, altar, show, two, small
heisigStory: We choose the city of Nara as the key word in this case because this kanji, frequently used in proper names, appears in Nara; and also because of Nara's famed religious monuments, which help us with the primitives: St. Bernard dog . . . altar.
koohiiStory1: It´s beautiful place, but the dark side of Nara is that they sacrifice St. Bernards on evil altars every night after the tourists leave!
koohiiStory2: Nara is just a big show for tourists.
